title: Data configuration
description: Defines the data configuration for the NeuronBridge.

constants.title: Constants
constants.description: Constants that are used in other data files to reduce the amount of data being transferred. They are referenced with `$key` and should be replaced with `value` when the data is used.

anatomicalRegions.title: Anatomical regions
anatomicalRegions.description: List of the anatomical regions that can be searched.

AnatomicalRegion.title: Anatomical region
AnatomicalRegion.description: Defines an anatomical region of the fly brain that can be searched using NeuronBridge. All searches are specific to one region.

value.title: Region name
value.description: Internal identifier for the anatomical region.

label.title: Region label
label.description: Label used for the anatomical region in the UI.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignment space
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which this images in this region are registered.

disabled.title: Disabled flag
disabled.description: True if this region is disabled in the UI.
